content:
Does anyone know what this error means and how to solve it? It typically appears once a week on the server and a reboot is a temporary solution...

[Django] zulip: Missing staticfiles manifest entry for 'webpack-bundles/common.51358a9c40e1d84f4763.css'
Inbox

Logger django.request, from module django.core.handlers.exception line 135:
Error generated by Anonymous user (not logged in) on zulip.domain.com deployment

Traceback (most recent call last):

    response = get_response(request)
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/2019-03-27-08-42-35/zulip-py3-venv/lib/python3.5/site-packages/django/core/handlers/base.py", line 217, in _get_response
    response = self.process_exception_by_middleware(e, request)
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/2019-03-27-08-42-35/zulip-py3-venv/lib/python3.5/site-packages/django/core/handlers/base.py", line 215, in _get_response
    response = response.render()
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/2019-03-27-08-42-35/zulip-py3-venv/lib/python3.5/site-packages/django/template/response.py", line 107, in render
    self.content = self.rendered_content

    content = template.render(context, self._request)
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/2019-03-27-08-42-35/zulip-py3-venv/lib/python3.5/site-packages/django/template/backends/jinja2.py", line 81, in render
    return self.template.render(context)
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/2019-03-27-08-42-35/zulip-py3-venv/lib/python3.5/site-packages/jinja2/environment.py", line 1008, in render
    return self.environment.handle_exception(exc_info, True)
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/2019-03-27-08-42-35/zulip-py3-venv/lib/python3.5/site-packages/jinja2/environment.py", line 780, in handle_exception
    reraise(exc_type, exc_value, tb)
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/2019-03-27-08-42-35/zulip-py3-venv/lib/python3.5/site-packages/jinja2/_compat.py", line 37, in reraise
    raise value.with_traceback(tb)
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/2019-03-27-08-42-35/zproject/../templates/zerver/login.html", line 1, in top-level template code
    {% extends "zerver/portico.html" %}
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/2019-03-27-08-42-35/zproject/../templates/zerver/portico.html", line 1, in top-level template code
    {% extends "zerver/base.html" %}
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/2019-03-27-08-42-35/zproject/../templates/zerver/base.html", line 30, in top-level template code
    {% block commonjs %}
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/2019-03-27-08-42-35/zproject/../templates/zerver/base.html", line 31, in block "commonjs"
    {{ render_bundle('common', attrs='nonce="%s"' % (csp_nonce)) }}
  File "/home/zulip/deployments/2019-03-27-08-42-35/zulip-py3-venv/lib/python3.5/site-packages/webpack_loader/contrib/jinja2ext.py", line 9, in <lambda>
    environment.globals["render_bundle"] = lambda *a, **k: jinja2.Markup(render_bundle(*a, **k))

    chunk['url'] = self.get_chunk_url(chunk)
